name: Scarlet Begonias -> Fire On The Mountain

performances.venue: Barton Hall - Cornell University Ithaca, NY
performances.description: Duh.  Probably the most well known rendition.  So good.

performances.venue: Uni Dome, U of Northern Iowa Cedar Falls, IA
performances.description: Dripping with creativity. Great version
Just exactly perfect. Jam in between flawless with triumphant enter into Fire.

performances.venue: Horton Field House - Illinois State University Normal, IL
performances.description: Holy shit this is hot
Such an awesome version.  Multiple jam segments filled with goodness
Silky smooth version.  Really beautiful version from an incredible show
Simply awesome.  How is this not on here?  May 1977 is an excellent time for Scarlet Fires.
Jazzy, smooth.  H.Q. 1977 right here.
The Rhythm Devils were jumping 2 nite! Epic, Epic show in Hartford that nite. The boys were on Fire!
Clockin in at 38 Min  Its the longest ever

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: I CAN'T believe this version has not been posted yet!!  SUPER long and SUPER space-jungley...
Talk about slipping through the cracks: This is a classic  long, jamming sick slick trip thru both tunes. Intro to FIRE one of the best ever performed
jerry with the haunted house sounds.  or like from a spaceship.  95 GEM
I don't know how this isn't up already. Give it a listen and you will understand.
1977 Scarlet->Fire, Smooth and tight Scarlet leads to a fluid liquid transition leads to a very tight hot jammed Fire on the Mountain.
Sweet Version from an Epic Show.
This is THE Scarlet Begonias of all Scarlet Begonias! MONSTER solo here folks!! Do yourself a favor and listen.
way underrated night in Chicago...great set closer
smoking,always reminds me of capturing sunset in a bottle...

performances.venue: Saratoga Performing Arts Center Saratoga Springs, NY
performances.description: Great jamming from the Saratoga forest
2nd song to open show at the closing of Winterland
strong post-brent version.  from a great late show
Really nice version from the round room.  Solid highlight

performances.venue: West Palm Beach Auditorium West Palm Beach, FL
performances.description: The very definition of "underrated." Almost lost to time& yet it kills. No flubbed verses, great steady reggae jams;perfect transition. Please try it.
best kept secret of '77! groove is in the pocket, vocals are good, minimal flubs

performances.venue: St. Paul Civic Center Arena St. Paul, MN
performances.description: It's criminal that this hasn't made the list yet. Like super-smooth '77 versions? You MUST hear this.

performances.venue: Montego Bay Freeport Zone Montego Bay, JM
performances.description: Jamaica , laid back island version, the band definetly had a VERY laid back mellow vibe to the show as well as this coupling a relaxed smooth reading
some missed lyrics made up for in jamming.  Plus hornsby on Grand
Very long and dripping Scarlet->Fire, tons of BRent and Jerry this is a very smoking version from an underrated tour, The drummers are very on driving
Slowish start, but the Fire is fire...April 78...not bad

performances.venue: New Haven Coliseum New Haven, CT
performances.description: Unthinkable that such headiness be left from the lists! Stunning swagger, swooshing Phil, bril transition, mad jams.

performances.venue: Louisiana State U Baton Rouge, LA
performances.description: Airy, beautiful, flowing rendition
A monster show and a monster Scarlet->Fire... the intro into Fire is to die for
One of the best of '83!
classic 77' version
Filled with Fire.

performances.venue: Springfield Civic Center Arena Springfield, MA
performances.description: This one has to be on the list, the jamming is not great, (They were very, very high), but the vocal finale is off the charts, just beaming with fun.
April '78 S>F's often mentioned are 4/16 and 4/24 (rightly so) but this one is every bit as good. Superior transition jam--, beautiful, & powerful
Sick of saying "How can X not be here" yet but C'mon! Get the digital DL series and start bumpin this up! Smooth Scarlet, killer Fire jams. Early gem!

performances.venue: Field House - Seneca College Toronto, ON
performances.description: Rarely heard (left out of DP Bonus tracks for Vol. 34) but another sweet/smooth '77 winner.
Friends dads favorite show

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: Fine version indeed.  Brent, Jerry, and the boys were in fine form this evening!

performances.venue: Patrick Gymnasium, U of Vermont Burlington, VT
performances.description: Fresh

performances.venue: Autzen Stadium, U. of Oregon Eugene, OR
performances.description: Coming in at nearly 30 minutes, this Scarlet>Fire is on par with the greatest
Very cool version!
A very strong version from the band's only show in Spain!
Amazing and wonderful interplay between Phil and Jerry, Not your typical version.

performances.venue: Long Beach Arena Long Beach, CA
performances.description: Cream of the crop, top shelf Scarlet<Fire. Easy to tell Garcia is in the zone. Lucid, flowing, and fabulous version.

performances.venue: Marin County Civic Center San Rafael, CA
performances.description: S>F for the ages... Scarlet very solid; perhaps top 3 Fire... funky and spacey transition
outta twilight zone space to open second set!!
Jerry is papa rasta, singing like tribe leader during final vocals

performances.venue: Deer Creek Music Center Noblesville, IN
performances.description: another awesome version with hornsby
First time played together, and the boys nailed it!

performances.venue: Greek Theatre, U. Of California Berkeley, CA
performances.description: Touch of Grey sandwiched in between.  Scarlet gets some extended jammy fun with an above average Fire on the Mountain too.

performances.venue: Field House - Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute Troy, NY
performances.description: One of those slow stoney '78 versions. nice pace and tempo to this one...

performances.venue: St. Paul Civic Center Arena St. Paul, MN
performances.description: Nice wonderful 1978 Scarlet Fire, Playful Scarlet leads to a hot Fire
First GD Red Rocks show.  check out this scarlet>fire
Fire at the Fox.
Hypnotic groove that will push you higher and higher. Fire. Fire. Fire on the mountain. An ancient rhythm emerges which hearkens to ancient times
The more that you give, the more it will take.
Another surprising no-show to this point...this one is classic. Jerry is owning it
30 + minutes, well jammed, many different themes.  The Fire is especially good, both keyboardists adding texture, Jerry finding a few unique rifts.
Super mellow transition from Scarlet to Fire

performances.venue: Activity Center - University of Colorado Boulder, CO
performances.description: Smokin' and charged with energy
Nice Scarlet extended first jam from Jerry tons of Brent here, The transition is stellar with ideas flowing from Jerry, Phil and Brent, hot exit jam
my friend ran out of this show scared.  he said the hill was on fire during fire on the mtn.  this one has a unique transition
Supar intricate, and explorative Scarlet, FOTM is just a smoke show

performances.venue: Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum Stadium Oakland, CA
performances.description: Long around a half hour, intricate and takes it time a nice slow burning version, with Sikiru Adepoju
Nice well jammed out Scarlet leads to a great transition which moves into a very hot Fire on the Mountain. Another nice 1977 Scarlet->Fire.
A hot version from one of the best Greek shows!

performances.venue: St. Paul Civic Center St. Paul, MN
performances.description: Really choice transition jam and segue to a burnin' Fire...loved this for so many years...
The ending jam of fire is some of their best playing of the year, hot version throughout but the end jam is off the charts
Show is proving to be a real hidden gem. Mt St Helens was allegedly erupting nearby for the 3rd time during Fire. Really hot Scarlet and on-point Fire
A great, high energy Scarlet. The band was very focused this night. The transition into Fire has a very relaxed feel.
Stunning transition with amazing flowing melodies from Jerry.

performances.venue: Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum Arena Oakland, CA
performances.description: In '90 the boys first started playing with MIDI- this version has church bells, and almost dissolves to space more that once.... CHECK IT!

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York City, NY
performances.description: Smoking version.
Cool early version of the combo.
Smokin' bonus jam before the bridge in Scarlet.
classic version
this show is one of the best. period.

performances.venue: World Music Theatre Tinley Park, IL
performances.description: midi jerry/brent on fire
Just a really great version...Really upbeat
I'm surprised this one isn't listed yet. Although the Fire is only average, this Scarlet is one of the best unsung versions ever.
Brent is singing so high in the background he almost sounds like Donna, Flawless Scarlet into a hot Fire with nice Bobby and Phil good band effort all

performances.venue: Alpine Valley Music Theatre East Troy, WI
performances.description: Super tight, they put on a good performance for John Cipollina who joins for post Drums.

performances.venue: Greek Theatre, U. Of California Berkeley, CA
performances.description: THIS WHOLE SHOW ARE WHAT DREAMS ARE MADE OFF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Beautiful version with a great transition.
Scarlet is a beautiful MIDI jam fest and the Fire is very long and leads into the rhythm devils, close to 30 minutes of joy
Phil loves DC.  this one is killer
Jerry rips this show and kills it on the Scarlet Fire. Playing the Wolf with strap on midi at these gigs.
Very Nice version.  Beats many of the other Hornsby versions.

performances.venue: Salt Palace Salt Lake City, UT
performances.description: What we called the quintessential Scarlet Fire. With all due respect, none on this list top it for me. Best transition and great Jerry runs on Fire.
Garcia plays around with some nice themes in the Scarlet, and the Fire is crushed. Nice combo here.

performances.venue: Glens Falls Civic Center Glens Falls, NY
performances.description: Melodic and creative soloing throughout; the transition (">") is absolutely on fire, musical communication between instruments is on point
Fast paced very well jammed out version, excellent transition tons of Phil and Jerry interplay on this one. Tight and hot version.
Nice slow tempo on scarlet allows for nice jams leads to a great  transition te fire explodes tons of energy the band rocking their asses off hot nice
Been in love with this FOTM forever

performances.venue: New Haven Coliseum New Haven, CT
performances.description: Dank version from pistol wavin' New Haven
Jerry's rockin' in this version of Fire...Do yourself a favor and listen up!
a very tasty combination - give this a listen.

performances.venue: Springfield Civic Center Arena Springfield, MA
performances.description: Another great version from the fall of ’79, give it a listen. Make sure you find the Charlie Miller_Rob Eaton SBD, very nice.

performances.venue: Soldiers' and Sailors' Memorial Hall Kansas City, KS
performances.description: Its worthy!

performances.venue: Sam Boyd Silver Bowl Las Vegas, NV
performances.description: typical for the time, that is killer.  santana opened but couldn't upstage jerry who was on fire all weekend
love me some 1979 Scarlet->Fire's...always funky and lot's of Phil

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: A Must Hear as Jerry shreds & the midi is feeling  Jamaican , Jah-Mon during Fire !
I remember everyone raving about this scarlet>fire
The most awesomely minimalistic intro I've heard, and indescribably epic transition into a beautiful Fire

performances.venue: Park West Ski Resort Park City, UT
performances.description: Man, '83 was kind to Scarlet->Fire!
Fast and really high energy, Jerry and Brent were on FIRE!
Tight and clean jams.
Very nice well jammed out scarlet->Fire to open set 2, paced perfectly allowing those fluid beautiful jams to develop nicely. Great full band effort.
One of only two ever Scarlet->Touch->Fires and full of fun goodness
Rockin' at Red Rocks.
approaching 78 - love the sound of Jerry's guitar
The only Scarlet>Victim>Fire.  What a way to kick off a second set. Incredible jams that just kept rolling.  One of the best of the late Dead era.
Jerry takes an energetic Scarlet into a mellow jazzy outro into a smooth transition into Fire then Phil starts raising the energy and the Fire grows..
The last Scarlet>Fire>Estimated>Eyes combo, the final Fire vocals are very nice, Fire, Fire, Fire, Fire…
Headiness such as this excluded? THIS S>F is downright profound. Perhaps due to the passing of Parish's wife and daughter, Garcia adds some dark vibes

performances.venue: Saratoga Performing Arts Center Saratoga Springs, NY
performances.description: Very tight and well performed Scarlet-> Fire. The Fire is full of some raging and inventive playing, sweet solos.
Jerry's Birthday
Intense set two opener, Powerful Scarlet fire
great early hornsby/welnick show.  Lots of midi/flute during jam. beautiful

performances.venue: Deer Creek Music Center Noblesville, IN
performances.description: inspired Jerry throughout

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: A groovin' hot version.

performances.venue: Cumberland County Civic Center Portland, ME
Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: One of my favorite later versions a must hear.

performances.venue: Henry J. Kaiser Convention Center Oakland, CA
performances.description: Not a spectacular show by any means; This S>F however is very strong, Garcia officially back from the dead

performances.venue: Recreation Hall - University of California Davis, CA
performances.description: Very shocking to emerge so deep in a set 2 particularly out of Playin in the band, Very unexpected an absolutely fun version all are enjoying this.
Another hot carlet Fire from 1978 not as long as some, cool transition and check out Bobby at the beginning of Fire.
There's a Jerry with 6 strings loose on Milwaukee

performances.venue: Soldier's And Sailors Memorial Hall Kansas City, KS
performances.description: Slow building scarlet takes off about half way through the fire is really cool and laid back with Jerry Just going off it is a nice long Fire.
Scarlet->Passenger->Scarlet->Fire, interesting give it a listen. due to some jerry guitar tech problems, i have read
Really a nice fun bubbling version of scarlet leads into a nice fluffy transition jam This FIRE is an ass kicker totally incendiary. A REAL TREAT
Set 2 Opener in Canada. SEVA Benefit show.

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: MSG Scarlet Fire from the Fall of '82 - great transition.
new guitar, great results!  first scarlet>fire with the Lightning Bolt
Transition jam weaves into spaces most fail to go; touch-down into Fire is GOLD. Jerry flubs first line in Fire-after that: 1 of the BEST ever!

performances.venue: Rutgers Athletic Center New Brunswick, NJ
performances.description: delivers the goods!
Wow part of a super sick pre drums Band on this evening. Scarlet is near perfection, And The Fire is on fire, sweet transition this has it all

performances.venue: Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum Arena Oakland, CA
performances.description: Tight peppy Scarlet leads into a smoking high energy Fire, awesome despite a few minor vocal flubs, Hot and Energetic,
Very nice midsong Scarlet jam and the transition is spectacular which leads into a POWERFUL Fire. Midi filled transition, Hot
From the first night at the pyramids, fantastic transition, VERY underrated performance and run as a whole
Absolutely on Fire way more energy then the Keith and donna versions Phil is thumping throughout. Very high energy killer performance. Passionate
long exploratory transition followed by a very hot fire loaded with Jerry riffs preceeds a hot estimated>eyes. Ripping with loads of Phil
Nice well executed Scarlet leads to a real nice funky playful transition, the inter song jams are really firey jerry just blazing notes wonderful
Alot of people talking about this one on that tour
this one is loose, and dripping with midi.  the boys are feeling right at home
SCORCHER
Seek out the CM SBD (2d set only). This is a fine combo w/Brent & Jer driving Scarlet & Phil prominent in Fire. '82 was a sweet year for S>F!
Nice Hot Phil lead Scarlet Begonias melts into a very nice Fire on the mountain with some nice Jerry Midi work and Phil on fire

performances.venue: Henry J. Kaiser Auditorium Oakland, CA
performances.description: Bouncy energetic loads of tension buildup a frenetic frenzy of a transition, Phil kills in Fire, Hot version
would love a better source for this version, crowd loving it> very killer set list
awesome
Band is in fine form.  Huge version, features great ensemble playing. FOTM peaks.
summer tour opener jerry isn't messing around
one of the best
Really strong, long latter-day version.

performances.venue: Spartan Stadium - San Jose State University San Jose, CA
performances.description: Scorching...
Tasty runs from Jerry, soft segue into Fire
Sugar Mag>Scarlet>Fire to open 2nd set, direct clean and polished
Cracklin' with energy

performances.venue: Long Beach Arena Long Beach, CA
performances.description: Very sweet version of the great 80's pre drums run of Scarlet-Fire-Estimated->Eyes. Killer version Loads of Phil and Jerry, very on performance
Jerry pulls out his bag of licks to make up for his burnt vocals. Transition and Fire jams are inspired.

performances.venue: Deer Creek Music Center Noblesville, IN
performances.description: Last one
Jaunty Scarlet into a nice BEAST of a FIRE
Last show of Spring Tour - Jer throws extra mustard on both of these.
jerry lovin it
1st solo, Jer w/beautiful stanza, suddenly drops 4steps then inserts halfs, (learned this lead, worked on it + months). Gets even better; way melodic.
Scarlet>Fire to open 1st set.......................Sweet!
Underated show.... who says the 80's are weak!

performances.venue: Bob Marley Performing Arts Center Montego Bay,
performances.description: I can't imagine how high everyone was.
Audio problems abound, but I quite fancy Jerry's playing in "Scarlet."
A great Vince version

performances.venue: Brendan Byrne Arena East Rutherford, NJ
performances.description: Heavy metal-style

performances.venue: Calavaras County Fairgrounds Angel's Camp, CA
performances.description: This is all about the Fire the middle Jam has real inventive different phrashes coming from Jerry and it pushes the last verse gives u goose bumps
Very Brent dominated performance, jams are hot but short, Very fast pairing and short but sweet. Brent is all over this.
Scarlet is full of midi goodness, nice and high energy version feeds into a nice hot Fire on the Mountain.
Very nice and hot Scarlet with a long interesting hot transition jam which leads to n exciting FIRE.
Knickerbocker Arena
Fast paced so they get a lot of jamming in over a relatively short Scarlet Fire.  Jerry realy is scorching during a very hot Fire.
Scarlet is the star here very long and jammy the Fire is actually rather short but the scarlet really soars. nice transition jam
Nice long scarlet with a real cool transition melts into a hot fanning Jerry fest of a fire
Hot version for NYE with special guest John Cippolina lending a nice solo to Fire on the Mountain. Good year for Scarlet->Fire
Nice  spacey transition jam leads to an incendiary fire with Jerry playing hot run after hot run a true Fantastic FIRE AMAZINGLY HOT!
Estimated-Scarlet Begonias-> Fire on the Mountain. What a tremendous killer sequence. This is some killer jamming right here.
NIce 1991 Scarlet Fire, Jerry does some absolutely interesting things during the Fire jams. Real cool interesting version.
raging fire
Great show, Great version.

performances.venue: Recreation Hall - Penn State University University Park, PA
performances.description: Long and epic. Transition is on fire, and whole combo flows perfectly.
This is a HOT all around show, Nice bouncy Scarlet leads into a nice very wel jammed out Fire On the Mountain
The last one for the year, THe Fire on this evening is incredibly smoking, Nice note bending from Jerry, nice mellow pace giving them loads of room

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: Fire jam shines on this one....
Back on the West Coast
Last one in California.
Intense drumming and passionate vocals from Jerry combine with a long hot fire to create a fantastic pairing of the popular duo
A nice heartwarming Scarlet leads beautifullu into a scorching well jammed out fire, Jerry just blistering notes jedi style, Fantastic

performances.venue: Kansas City Municipal Auditorium Arena Kansas City, MO
performances.description: Nice funky Scarlet loads of Brent and Jerry jamming it out. Real ripping version at a nice quick pace
Typically hot pairing with loads of Phil and some real nice runs by Vince
only scarlet fire of fall tour, rare one in 89
so many fine versions..this one should be included
One of the all time best ever!!!

performances.venue: Poplar Creek Music Theater Hofman Estates, IL
performances.description: Yet another hot '83 version.
Delicious slow burning transition after such a high paced cooking Scarlet, Very hot well jammed Fire with Jerry leading the way

performances.venue: Greek Theatre, U. Of California Berkeley, CA
performances.description: Very high energy Scarlet with Jerry giving it that extra something, smooth move into Fire. Again Jerry giving all the vocals that extra little somethi

performances.venue: Keifer Lakefront Arena New Orleans, LA
performances.description: Another hot Scarlet -> Fire with Jerry very engaged, Phil Brent and Jerry are all extremely on in this sweet version. Loads of Bombs and B3

performances.venue: Henry J. Kaiser Convention Center Oakland, CA
performances.description: Excellent bouncy Scarlet but the real star here is a totally insane well jammed out Fire on the Mountain. Wonderful shredder
Scarlet gets very out there and spacey at times leads to a nice hot fire with a Weir slide solo during the second jam.

performances.venue: Dallas County Convention Center Arena Dallas, TX
performances.description: Real long and spacey scarlet interesting transition deep space into a short Hot Fire
Brent takes the reigns and leads a really great transition jam full of tons of synth and other sounds, Jerry grabs hold during Fire for a sweet duel
Real nice long Scarlet to open the pair well explored and the transition is real nice leads to a nice well jammed fire

performances.venue: Henry J. Kaiser Convention Center Oakland, CA
performances.description: Nice jammy version real hot scarlet nice long jams this is a real good one.

performances.venue: Radio City Music Hall New York, NY
performances.description: Set 3 Opens Truckin->Scarlet->Fire. nice and well played a hot trio before the drums space segment
Sprightly Scarlet Begonias develops into a nice hot Fire on the Mountain nice smooth hot transition.

performances.venue: Long Beach Arena Long Beach, CA
performances.description: Nice AUD has Jerry up front. Great solo in SB, transition is interesting, with nice cascading riffs, followed by a Hot FOTM.
Speedy rapid pace try to keep up with this one must've had the fat man's guitar smoking. Blaze on!
Dicks Picks 6. Very bubbly inspired playing and communication by the band.

performances.venue: Veterans' Memorial Coliseum New Haven, CT
performances.description: Scarlet starts off slow, but picks up after to first solo to an amazing jam into Fire, which turns into a crazy whoop an' holler

performances.venue: New Haven Coliseum New Haven, CT
performances.description: cool
Here's where the bus came by for me. My first show...every note is burned into my brain!
Another excellent rocked out version of Scarlet Fire from 1987. Very straight forward high octane Jamming

performances.venue: MacArthur Court, U of Oregon Eugene, OR
performances.description: Short pairing but paced real quickly and loaded with some real hot real fast jamming,

performances.venue: Saenger Performing Arts Center New Orleans, LA
performances.description: The transition jam has several peaks before entering Fire Both versions have some excellent moments
From Dicks Picks 18 - Jerry's solo is absolutely smoking and never seems to end...
Cool version
crusher

performances.venue: Long Beach Arena Long Beach, CA
performances.description: Brent spreads fairy dust...Jerry hits Fire 2nd solo hard.

performances.venue: Cumberland County Civic Center Portland, ME
performances.description: Good version from a decent AUD.
Lots of Midid on this Scarlet Jerry using the horns to blow a beautiful version, Slow potent burn transition, soft noodolling ending into Estimated
Short and Compact Scarlet Fire but packs a nice punch, from the post health scare shows in 1992, Well received by the crowd and bandputs forth a solid
Only an audience on archive with the very beginning of scarlet clipped, still a very quick paced high energy run through. Ripping leads in fire
High energy quick paced Scarlet melds into a nice hot lava spewing fire on the mountain
W/ B. Marsalis

performances.venue: Henry J. Kaiser Convention Center Oakland, CA
performances.description: Musically Awesome

performances.venue: Sam Boyd Silver Bowl Las Vegas, NV
performances.description: A "Scarlet -> Fire" not listed? Color me shocked. This one's a good one from the last of three really great nights in Vegas. Jerry's dialed in.
The transition jam is where this one really shines, pretty good for the era. Transitions into a pretty smokin Samson

performances.venue: Sam Boyd Silver Bowl Las Vegas, NV
performances.description: Superb Vince/Bruce era version. Sweet transition, groovy Scarlet, funky Fire. Jerry having fun!
Prepare youself for blastoff during this version. This day might be the show of 76'. A must listen!
C'mon, no love for Egypt? Stony '78 groove with the Olin lead in. Always takes me there

performances.venue: San Francisco Civic Auditorium San Francisco, CA
performances.description: Chinese New Years version, Tight and very well played excellent full band effort
Very high energy monster version of Scarlet Fire, Sizzling leads from Jerry and Phi just bombs the proceeding s mercilessly

performances.venue: Radio City Music Hall New York, NY
performances.description: Nice jammy and improvisational pairing hot transition jam from a nicely jammed scarlet into a hot jammed fire
The only version of Scarlet / Eyes - not Scarlet Fire - that I know of
Good
Great energy - searing 2nd solo, no FOTM - is that why it's not here? It's deserving.
Powerful version

performances.venue: Pine Knob Music Theatre Clarkston, MI
performances.description: This whole show is filled with incredible interplay from everyone, vince is on fire (and scarlet)
Smoking and ripping with a very happy vibe!
